name: data-table-column-hide
title: DataTable Column Hide
description: Column header option to hide/show individual columns.

files.content: "use client" import type { Column } from "@tanstack/react-table" import { CircleHelp, EyeOff } from "lucide-react" import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button" import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem, DropdownMenuLabel, DropdownMenuSeparator, DropdownMenuTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/dropdown-menu" import { Tooltip, TooltipContent, TooltipTrigger, } from "@/components/ui/tooltip" import { cn } from "@/lib/utils" /** * Dropdown menu item for hiding a column. * Use inside a DropdownMenuContent or as a child of TableColumnActions. * * @example * ```tsx * // Inside TableColumnActions * * * * ``` */ export function TableColumnHideOptions({ column, withSeparator = true, }: { column: Column /** Whether to render a separator before the option. Defaults to true. */ withSeparator?: boolean }) { const canHide = column.getCanHide() if (!canHide) return null return ( <> {withSeparator && } Column Hide Hide this column from view column.toggleVisibility(false)}> Hide Column ) } /** * Standalone dropdown menu for hiding a column. * Shows a hide button that opens a dropdown. * * @example * ```tsx * // Standalone usage * * ``` */ export function TableColumnHideMenu({ column, className, }: { column: Column className?: string }) { const canHide = column.getCanHide() if (!canHide) return null return ( Column Hide Hide this column from view column.toggleVisibility(false)}> Hide Column ) } /** @deprecated Use `TableColumnHideMenu` instead */ export const TableColumnHide = TableColumnHideMenu TableColumnHideOptions.displayName = "TableColumnHideOptions" TableColumnHideMenu.displayName = "TableColumnHideMenu"
